actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to limit the authority of the Resolution Trust Corporation to abrogate residential tenant contract and leases.

summary.text: Tenant Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to limit the Resolution Trust Corporation's authority to abrogate residential tenant contracts and leases only to the extent permitted under State or local law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to limit the authority of the Resolution Trust Corporation to abrogate residential tenant contract and leases.
